title: Designing a Multiple Intelligences-Based Adaptive Science Learning System

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A learning environment for working professionals outside work hours, characterized by significant differences in individual learning styles and the use of diverse digital devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners identify at least three learning preferences based on multiple intelligence test results.
Learners analyze differences between system-recommended and self-selected materials and improve learning effectiveness by 15%+.
Learners create video portfolios explaining scientific problem-solving processes in project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
